title: Remove PDF column from application status display

requirements.text: Remove the PDF attachment column/section from the ApplicationStatusManager component display while preserving the underlying PDF storage functionality in the backend
acceptanceCriteria: The PDF column is no longer visible in the application status table/list
Users cannot see or download PDF attachments from the UI
PDF data continues to be stored in the backend when creating/editing status entries
The PdfAttachmentSection component is not rendered
No PDF-related UI elements appear in the ApplicationStatusManager component

constraints: Do not modify backend PDF storage logic
Do not change the backend schema or data structure
nonGoals: Removing PDF storage from the backend
Removing PDF upload functionality from forms
